item.description:
If you're a fan of Steely Dan, you'll love No Static, a terrific Steely Dan cover band.  They're at Ryles on 26 January, so let's Meetup for a night of great music and dancing.

Not familiar with No Static?  You can check out a few of their Steely Dan covers on their website.

The show starts at 9:00 and tickets are $12 at the door. Tickets are now available online:  check here for online ticket sales.

Please consider buying tickets ahead of time as No Static has previously sold out Ryles and I have three Meetup groups attending:

Cambridge-Somerville Live Music
Fun with Alcohol!
Social Fun

In addition, the Sitzundjibers group is running a Meetup at Ryles that night.  The total for the four groups is almost 70 people as of this writing (9 January 2013).

Ryles also serves dinner.  You can see their menu online if you're interested in dinner & a show.  (The Mitch's Barbecue is quite good.)

 

See you there!
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be hanging at the bar & I look more or less like my profile picture. I'll also send my cell # to everyone on the afternoon of the show.
item.name: No Static @ Ryles
